task.title: Fix Cargo.lock version incompatibility in Docker build

events.content: Pinned Rust builder version via ARG and documented Cargo.lock v4 requirement: Pinned Rust builder version via ARG and documented Cargo.lock v4 requirement

raw.question: Pinned Rust builder version via ARG and documented Cargo.lock v4 requirement
raw.chosen: Pinned Rust builder version via ARG and documented Cargo.lock v4 requirement
raw.reasoning: Ensure Docker build uses Cargo >=1.78 while keeping version easy to bump

retrospective.summary: Documented Cargo.lock v4 requirement and pinned Rust builder via ARG in Dockerfile.base
